{
  "name": "projet-gestion",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Application de gestion de projet avec React frontend, Node.js/Express backend, MongoDB, authentification JWT, upload de fichiers, notifications en temps réel avec Socket.io, et déploiement Docker",
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node server.js",
    "dev": "npm run start & npm run build-watch",
    "build": "npm run build-watch && tsc",
    "build-watch": "tsc --watch",
    "lint": "eslint src/**/*.{ts,tsx} --fix"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "projet",
    "gestion",
    "réact",
    "node",
    "express",
    "mongodb",
      "jwt",
    "upload",
    "socketio",
    "docker"
  ],
  "author": "Votre nom",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "mongoose": "^5.10.19",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^8.5.1",
    "multer": "^1.4.2",
    "socket.io": "^4.5.4",
    "typescript": "^4.4.4",
    "react": "^17.0.2",
    "react-dom": "^17.0.2",
    "@types/node": "^16.11.21",
    "@types/react": "^17.0.38",
    "@types/express": "^4.17.11",
    "@types/mongoose": "^5.10.19",
    "@types/socket.io": "^4.5.2",
    "babel-loader": "^8.2.2",
    "webpack": "^5.64.2",
    "webpack-cli": "^4.8.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "ts-loader": "^9.2.3",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^4.4.3",
    "nodemon": "^2.0.12",
    "eslint": "^7.32.0",
    "prettier": "^2.6.1"
  },
  "description": "",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/votre-repo/projet-gestion.git"
  }
}
